title: TFR Ep. 575: No Time To Die, Rabid, 5 Best Bond Gadgets
description:
This week on The First Run, Chris’ long wait for the Daniel Craig’s final outing as James Bond is over as after multiple delays, ‘No Time To Die’ is finally here.  Matt saw it too.  After all this time and all the self-imposed hype by Chris, can it possible stand up to his lofty expectations and be the perfect send off for Craig?  Then the Body Horror Marathon continues with David Cronenberg’s ‘Rabid’.  If you ever wondered what would happen if you were in a bad motorcycle accident and had to be cared for by the local experimental plastic surgery shop as the closest hospital was too far away and then you developed some weird deformity that made you feed on blood and then infect your victims with their own insatiable need for blood, we have the film for you.  There’s the venerable rundown of the big releases on Physical Media, featuring the Streaming and Straight to DVD Picks of the Week.  Matt and Chris then close out the show by sharing their 5 Favorite Bond Gadgets!  How many of them are cars?  Any exploding pens or magnetic watches?  Listen to find out Double O fans!

00:00-16:57: Intro/No Time To Die

16:58-32:09: No Time To Die Spoilers and More

32:10-40:16: Physical Media Picks

40:17-48:12: Rabid

48:13-58:24: 5 Favorite Bond Gadgets

58:25-01:00:31: Wrap Up

 Theme music by Jamal Malachi Ford-Bey

Twitter

Instagram

Facebook

This week on The First Run, Chris’ long wait for the Daniel Craig’s final outing as James Bond is over as after multiple delays, ‘No Time To Die’ is finally here.  Matt saw it too.  After all this time and all the self-imposed hype by Chris, can it possible stand up to his lofty expectations and be the perfect send off for Craig?  Then the Body Horror Marathon continues with David Cronenberg’s ‘Rabid’.  If you ever wondered what would happen if you were in a bad motorcycle accident and had to be cared for by the local experimental plastic surgery shop as the closest hospital was too far away and then you developed some weird deformity that made you feed on blood and then infect your victims with their own insatiable need for blood, we have the film for you.  There’s the venerable rundown of the big releases on Physical Media, featuring the Streaming and Straight to DVD Picks of the Week.  Matt and Chris then close out the show by sharing their 5 Favorite Bond Gadgets!  How many of them are cars?  Any exploding pens or magnetic watches?  Listen to find out Double O fans!
